name: SouthernBancorpVoiceBanking
0:
”Alexa, Open Southern Bancorp”
”Alexa, Ask Southern Bancorp for my balance”
”Alexa, Ask Southern Bancorp for my last deposit”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: southern bancorp
des:
The Southern Bancorp skill allows users to access information about their Southern Bancorp account including balances, deposit amounts and history, transfers and transactions, and even the impact that users have as customers of a community development bank. 

After you've linked your account and opened the skill you can ask the following. 

• What are my balances? 
• What was my last deposit?
• I’d like to transfer money. 
• What is my transaction history? 
• What is my community impact?

* Financial information will be read aloud and/or displayed visually.
